QA Automation Tester Interview QuestionsSelenium WebDriver: 1Ô∏è‚É£ What are different types of locators in Selenium? 2Ô∏è‚É£ When do you use Xpath over CSS locators? 3Ô∏è‚É£ How to get a specific value from a dropdown and reuse it in verifications? 4Ô∏è‚É£ When do we use JavaScript Executors? 5Ô∏è‚É£ Is it possible to validate Captcha using Selenium? If yes, how? 6Ô∏è‚É£ What should be the ideal way to store data using Selenium WebDriver only? 7Ô∏è‚É£ Is it possible to use Xpath like parent/child/node/.. ? If yes, provide an example where to use it? 8Ô∏è‚É£ What happens if you receive browser notifications during test automation execution? 9Ô∏è‚É£ Why does Stale Element Exception occur, and how to handle it? üîü What is Invalid Certificate Exception? APIs: 1Ô∏è‚É£ What are the components of an HTTP request? 2Ô∏è‚É£ What is the difference between API and unit testing? 3Ô∏è‚É£ What is an HTTP response? 4Ô∏è‚É£ How can we add validation points in Postman? 5Ô∏è‚É£ What do you understand by server-side validation? 6Ô∏è‚É£ What is 3-tier architecture? 7Ô∏è‚É£ What is the difference between web services and APIs? 8Ô∏è‚É£ What is REST, SOAP, and GraphQL in APIs? 9Ô∏è‚É£ What do you test in standalone APIs? üîü What do you test in 3rd-party integrated APIs? Postman:1Ô∏è‚É£ When to use collections, environments, and global variables? 2Ô∏è‚É£ How to execute a collection end-to-end? 3Ô∏è‚É£ How to validate that an API response has the correct status code? 4Ô∏è‚É£ What happens when an API response returns Form Data instead of JSON, and how to validate it? 5Ô∏è‚É£ How to set up Basic Auth in Postman? 6Ô∏è‚É£ Where do you store environment credentials? 7Ô∏è‚É£ How to save a demo response for an API request? 8Ô∏è‚É£ How will you validate an API request if VPN is required for it to work? 9Ô∏è‚É£ How do you filter results in an API request using Postman? üîü How to set up custom headers in Postman? Git: 1Ô∏è‚É£ What are the different stages in committing the code to GitHub? 2Ô∏è‚É£ Is it possible to revert changes in a remote repository? If yes, how? 3Ô∏è‚É£ When do you commit your code? If yes, provide an example where to use it? 8Ô∏è‚É£ What happens if you receive browser notifications during test automation execution? 9Ô∏è‚É£ Why does Stale Element Exception occur, and how to handle it? üîü What is Invalid Certificate Exception? APIs: 1Ô∏è‚É£ What are the components of an HTTP request? 2Ô∏è‚É£ What is the difference between API and unit testing? 3Ô∏è‚É£ What is an HTTP response? 4Ô∏è‚É£ How can we add validation points in Postman? 5Ô∏è‚É£ What do you understand by server-side validation? 6Ô∏è‚É£ What is 3-tier architecture? 7Ô∏è‚É£ What is the difference between web services and APIs? 8Ô∏è‚É£ What is REST, SOAP, and GraphQL in APIs? 9Ô∏è‚É£ What do you test in standalone APIs? üîü What do you test in 3rd-party integrated APIs? Postman:1Ô∏è‚É£ When to use collections, environments, and global variables? 2Ô∏è‚É£ How to execute a collection end-to-end? 3Ô∏è‚É£ How to validate that an API response has the correct status code? 4Ô∏è‚É£ What happens when an API response returns Form Data instead of JSON, and how to validate it? 5Ô∏è‚É£ How to set up Basic Auth in Postman? 6Ô∏è‚É£ Where do you store environment credentials? 7Ô∏è‚É£ How to save a demo response for an API request? 8Ô∏è‚É£ How will you validate an API request if VPN is required for it to work? 9Ô∏è‚É£ How do you filter results in an API request using Postman? üîü How to set up custom headers in Postman? Git: 1Ô∏è‚É£ What are the different stages in committing the code to GitHub? 2Ô∏è‚É£ Is it possible to revert changes in a remote repository? If yes, how? 3Ô∏è‚É£ When do you commit your code? AI can assist‚Ä¶ but it can‚Äôt think like a tester.
